summary: Clinic management application with admin panel for controlling clinic open/close status
architectural_notes: Admin panel requires open/close control buttons (not just status display)
Permission system needs configuration to allow admin access
known_issues: Admin panel showing 'You may not have the required permissions' error
Admin panel missing interactive open/close buttons - currently only shows status

existing_features.title: Fix the 'You may not have the required permissions. Please contact the system administrator.' error in the admin panel by ensuring proper authentication checks and authorization flow
Add interactive Open and Close buttons in the admin panel to control clinic status, replacing the current read-only status display
Ensure the manual clinic status override functionality in the backend is properly integrated with the admin panel controls
